node.title: Watch Kristen Stewart Embody Princess Diana in ‘Spencer’
node.description: The director Pablo Larraín narrates a sequence from his film.
node.content: ["In \u201cAnatomy of a Scene,\u201d we ask directors to reveal the secrets that go into making key scenes in their movies. See new episodes in the series on Fridays. You can also watch our collection of more than 150 videos on YouTube and subscribe to our YouTube channel.", "A dinner with the royal family becomes a hallucinatory nightmare in this scene from \u201cSpencer,\u201d starring Kristen Stewart as Princess Diana.", "Diana is late to join a formal dinner and arrives in a somewhat agitated state. The scene plays without dialogue and is scored with string music from the composer Jonny Greenwood that grows ever more anxious as the dinner progresses.", "Narrating the sequence, the director Pablo Larra\u00edn discusses some of his techniques for heightening the mood. He said that he had asked Stewart not to go onto the set until they were ready to shoot, so that when she enters, it would be her first time seeing the rest of the cast in place at the table.", "Read the \u201cSpencer\u201d review.", "Sign up for the Movies Update newsletter and get a roundup of reviews, news, Critics\u2019 Picks and more."]
